actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 558 of the Tax Reform Act of 1984 with respect to the treatment of certain collective bargaining agreements.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1984 to extend from September 26, 1980, to June 12, 1982, the date by which a specified employer (Master Chemical Company) in Ohio may withdraw from a multiemployer pension plan and still have its liability to the plan voided.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 558 of the Tax Reform Act of 1984 with respect to the treatment of certain collective bargaining agreements.
